mapper.select: SELECT cntnt_id as cntntId, cntnt_cate_code as cntntCateCode, cntnt_title as cntntTitle, cntnt_kwrd as cntntKwrd, cntnt_url as cntntUrl, cntnt_regist_date as cntntRegistDate, cntnt_update_date as cntntUpdeDate, cntnt_delete_yn as cntntDeleteYn FROM tb_cntnt

SELECT cntnt_id as cntntId, cntnt_cate_code as cntntCateCode, cntnt_title as cntntTitle, cntnt_kwrd as cntntKwrd, cntnt_url as cntntUrl, cntnt_regist_date as cntntRegistDate, cntnt_update_date as cntntUpdeDate, cntnt_delete_yn as cntntDeleteYn FROM tb_cntnt WHERE cntnt_id = #{cntntId}
